description: Show a header on the dialog with this text
name: title

description: Text or html message for this dialog
name: message

description: Text to show on the confirmation button
name: confirmText

description: Text to show on the cancel  button
name: cancelText

description: Focus on confirm or cancel button when dialog opens
name: focusOn

description: Show this icon on left-side of dialog. It will use the color from type
name: icon

description: Fontawesome icon pack to use. By default the Icon component uses fas
name: iconPack

description: Show the cancel button. True for confirm()
name: showCancel

description: Type (color) to use on confirm button and icon
name: type

description: Animation to use when showing dialog
name: animation
values: Any transition name that ships with Svelte, or a custom function

description: Props to pass to animation function
name: animProps

description: Props (attributes) to use to on prompt input element
name: inputProps
